command: az storage account create --name storage117de92b0c469bbb --resource-group resource-117de92b0c469bbb --location eastus --sku Standard_LRS --kind StorageV2

description: Get the storage account connection string
command: az storage account show-connection-string --name storage117de92b0c469bbb --resource-group resource-117de92b0c469bbb --output tsv

description: Create a container in the storage account
command: az storage container create --name reactapp --account-name storage117de92b0c469bbb --public-access blob --connection-string <connection_string>

description: Upload the build folder to the container
command: az storage blob upload-batch --destination reactapp --source ../sample-app/dist --pattern * --type block --account-name storage117de92b0c469bbb --connection-string <connection_string>

description: Enable static website hosting for the storage account
command: az storage blob service-properties update --account-name storage117de92b0c469bbb --static-website --404-document 404.html --index-document index.html --connection-string <connection_string>

description: Get the primary web endpoint for the storage account
command: az storage account show --name storage117de92b0c469bbb --resource-group resource-117de92b0c469bbb --query 'primaryEndpoints.web' --output tsv
